name: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButton
desc: A button that allows the user to add or edit a shortcut.

items.name: init(style: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonStyle)
items.desc: Creates an Add to Siri button with the specified style.

items.name: enum INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonStyle
items.desc: The styles for the Add to Siri button.

items.name: var shortcut: INShortcut?
items.desc: The shortcut Siri invokes when the user speaks the invocation phrase.

items.name: var delegate: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate?
items.desc: The object that receives presentation requests from the button.

items.name: protocol INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate
items.desc: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the Siri Shortcut button.
